Name of the Vacancies:

  • Non-Executive (Junior Engineer Assistant, Engineer Assistant, Store Assistant, Account Assistant, Lab Assistant

Description

Latest Central Government Jobs for Diploma holders have been published by Hindustan Urvarak & Rasayan Limited (HURL)  for Non-Executive vacancies in India. If you are searching for a government job in India then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies of Non-Executive, from 03-08-2021, and till 16-08-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in India and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • No information about the application fee

Educational qualification:

  • To apply for a Non-Executive in HURL, your B.A./B.SC./B.Com must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 03-08-2021 
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 16-08-2021

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 35 years old. 

HURL Non-Executive Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the Central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for HURL Non-Executive Recruitment 2021?

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process of the Non-Executive. Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of HURL and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by HURL
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.
